sqlMap.select: select id,user_id as user,book_id as book,record,evaluation,score,create_time as createTime,share from t_record where id=#id#;
select id,user_id as user,book_id as book,record,evaluation,score,create_time as createTime,share from t_record order by create_time desc limit #start#,#limit#;
select id,user_id as user,book_id as book,record,evaluation,score,create_time as createTime,share from t_record order by create_time desc where user_id=#userId# limit #start#,#limit#;
sqlMap.update: update t_record set user_id=#userId#, book_id=#bookId#,record=#record#, evaluation=#evaluation#,score=#score#,share=#share# where id=#id#;
